name: Circle Fit [OBSOLETE]
description: Create tangent circles

name: Point in Curves
description: Test a point for multiple closed curve containment.

outputs.name: Index
outputs.description: Index of first region that contains the point

name: Rectangle
description: Create a rectangle on a plane

inputs.name: X Size
inputs.description: Dimensions of rectangle in plane X direction.

inputs.name: Y Size
inputs.description: Dimensions of rectangle in plane y direction.

name: Curve Frames
description: Generate a number of equally spaced curve frames.

name: End Points
description: Extract the end points of a curve.

name: Tween Curve
description: Tween between two curves.

name: Blend Curve Pt
description: Create a blend curve between two curves that intersects a point.

outputs.name: Blend
outputs.description: Blend curve connecting the end of A to the start of B, ideally coincident with P

name: Curve Domain
description: Retrieve the domain of a curve. This component is obsolete.

name: Evaluate Curve
description: Evaluate a curve at the specified parameter.

name: Length Domain
description: Measure the length of a curve subdomain.

name: Offset Curve
description: Offset a curve with a specified distance.

inputs.name: Corners
inputs.description: Corner type flag. Possible values:    none = 0  sharp = 1  round = 2  smooth = 3  chamfer = 4

name: Divide Distance
description: Divide a curve with a preset distance between points

name: Fit Line
description: Fit a line to a collection of points.

name: Nurbs Curve PWK
description: Construct a nurbs curve from control points, weights and knots.

name: Divide Curve
description: Divide a curve into equal length segments

name: Iso Curve
description: Create {uv} isocurves on a surface.

inputs.name: UV point
inputs.description: {uv} coordinate on surface for isocurve extraction.

name: Flip Curve
description: Flip a curve using an optional guide curve.

name: Deconstruct Arc
description: Retrieve the base plane, radius and angle domain of an arc.

outputs.name: Base Plane
outputs.description: Base plane of arc or circle

name: Discontinuity
description: Find all discontinuities along a curve.

inputs.name: Level
inputs.description: Level of discontinuity to test for (1=C1, 2=C2, 3=Cinfinite)

name: Catenary
description: Create a catenary chain between two points.

inputs.name: Length
inputs.description: Length of catenary chain (should be larger than the distance |AB|)

name: Match Curve
description: Match two curves.

name: InCircle
description: Create the incircle of a triangle.

name: Curve To Polyline
description: Convert a curve to a polyline.

name: Shatter
description: Shatter a curve into segments.

name: Interpolate
description: Create an interpolated curve through a set of points.

name: Curve Closest Point
description: Find the closest point on a curve.

outputs.name: Point
outputs.description: Point on the curve closest to the base point

outputs.name: Parameter
outputs.description: Parameter on curve domain of closest point

outputs.name: Distance
outputs.description: Distance between base point and curve

name: Fillet
description: Fillet the sharp corners of a curve.

name: Bezier Span
description: Construct a bezier span from endpoints and tangents.

name: Closed
description: Test if a curve is closed or periodic.

outputs.name: Closed
outputs.description: True if curve is closed or periodic

name: Arc 3Pt [OBSOLETE]
description: Create an arc through three points.

name: Rectangle 3Pt
description: Create a rectangle from three points

inputs.name: Point C
inputs.description: Point along rectangle edge opposite to AB

name: Contour (ex)
description: Create a set of Curve contours

inputs.name: Offsets
inputs.description: Contour offsets from base plane (if omitted, you must specify distances instead)

inputs.name: Distances
inputs.description: Distances between contours (if omitted, you must specify offset instead)

outputs.name: Parameters
outputs.description: Curve parameters for all contour points

name: Swing Arc
description: Create a polycurve consisting of arcs defined by center points.

inputs.name: Centers
inputs.description: Center points for swing arc segments

inputs.name: Plane
inputs.description: Optional plane for swing arc solution. If omitted, the best fit plane is used.

outputs.name: Circles
outputs.description: Tangent circles that define the swing curves

name: Control Points
description: Extract the nurbs control points and knots of a curve.

name: Sub Curve
description: Construct a curve from the sub-domain of a base curve.

name: Seam
description: Adjust the seam of a closed curve.

name: Ellipse
description: Create an ellipse defined by base plane and two radii.

name: Circle 3Pt
description: Create a circle defined by three points.

name: Line
description: Create a line between two points.

name: Line SDL
description: Create a line segment defined by start point, tangent and length.}

name: Interpolate (t)
description: Create an interpolated curve through a set of points with tangents.

inputs.name: Degree
inputs.description: Curve degree (at the moment only 3 is a valid degree).

name: Circle TanTan
description: Create a circle tangent to two curves.

name: Line 2Plane
description: Create a line between two planes.

inputs.name: Plane A
inputs.description: First plane to intersect with the guide.

inputs.name: Plane B
inputs.description: Second plane to intersect with the guide.

outputs.name: Line
outputs.description: Line segment between A and B

name: Rectangle 2Pt
description: Create a rectangle from a base plane and two points

outputs.name: Rectangle
outputs.description: Rectangle defined by P, A and B

name: Planar
description: Test a curve for planarity.

name: Blend Curve
description: Create a blend curve between two curves.

outputs.name: Blend
outputs.description: Blend curve connecting the end of A to the start of B

name: Polygon Center
description: Find the center point (average) for a polyline.

name: Smooth Polyline
description: Smooth the vertices of a polyline curve.

inputs.name: Times
inputs.description: Number of times to apply the smoothing operation

name: Extend Curve
description: Extend a curve by a specified distance.

inputs.name: Start
inputs.description: Extension length at start of curve

inputs.name: End
inputs.description: Extension length at end of curve

name: Control Polygon
description: Extract the nurbs control polygon of a curve.

outputs.name: Polygon
outputs.description: Control polygon curve for input curve adjusted for periodicity.

name: InEllipse
description: Create the inscribed ellipse (Steiner ellipse) of a triangle.

name: Perp Frame
description: Solve the perpendicular (zero-twisting) frame at a specified curve parameter.

inputs.name: Parameter
inputs.description: Parameter on curve domain to evaluate

name: Evaluate Length
description: Evaluate a curve at a certain factor along its length. Length factors can be supplied both in curve units and normalized units. Change the [N] parameter to toggle between the two modes.

inputs.name: Normalized
inputs.description: If True, the Length factor is normalized (0.0 ~ 1.0)

outputs.name: Tangent
outputs.description: Tangent vector at the specified length

outputs.name: Parameter
outputs.description: Curve parameter at the specified length

name: Curve Frame
description: Get the curvature frame of a curve at a specified parameter.

inputs.name: Parameter
inputs.description: Parameter on curve domain to evaluate

name: Pull Curve
description: Pull a curve onto a surface.

name: Curve Proximity
description: Find the pair of closest points between two curves.

outputs.name: Point A
outputs.description: Point on curve A closest to curve B

outputs.name: Point B
outputs.description: Point on curve B closest to curve A

name: Perp Frames [OBSOLETE]
description: OBSOLETE_COMPONENT replaced by a New Perpendicular frame routine

name: Divide By Deviation
description: Divide a curve into segments with equal deviation

outputs.name: Deviation
outputs.description: Maximum deviation from segment to curve

name: Kinky Curve
description: Construct an interpolated curve through a set of points with a kink angle threshold.

name: Fillet Distance
description: Fillet the sharp corners of a curve by distance.

inputs.name: Distance
inputs.description: Distance from corner of fillet start

name: PolyArc
description: Create a polycurve consisting of arc and line segments.

name: PolyLine
description: Create a polyline connecting a number of points.

name: Curvature Graph
description: Draws Rhino Curvature Graphs.

name: Curve Nearest Object
description: Find the object nearest to a curve.

outputs.name: Point A
outputs.description: Point on curve closest to nearest shape

outputs.name: Point B
outputs.description: Point on nearest shape closest to curve

name: Interpolate (t)
description: Create an interpolated curve through a set of points with tangents.

name: BiArc
description: Create a bi-arc based on endpoints and tangents.

inputs.name: Start Tangent
inputs.description: Tangent vector at start of bi-arc.

inputs.name: End Tangent
inputs.description: Tangent vector at end of bi-arc.

name: Catenary Ex
description: Create a variable catenary chain between two points.

inputs.name: Weights
inputs.description: Weight (per length unit) of catenargy chain segments

name: Polygon Center
description: Find the center point (average) for a polyline.

name: Join Curves
description: Join as many curves as possible

outputs.name: Curves
outputs.description: Joined curves and individual curves that could not be joined.

name: Circle
description: Create a circle defined by base plane and radius.

name: Offset Curve Loose
description: Offset the control-points of a curve with a specified distance.

name: Polygon
description: Create a polygon with optional round edges.

inputs.name: Radius
inputs.description: Radius of polygon (distance from center to tip).

name: Knot Vector
description: Construct a nurbs curve knot vector.

name: Polygon Center
description: Find the center point (average) for a polyline.

name: Reduce
description: Reduce a polyline by removing least significant vertices.

inputs.name: Tolerance
inputs.description: Tolerance (allowed deviation between original and reduction)

outputs.name: Reduction
outputs.description: Number of vertices removed during reduction

name: Contour
description: Create a set of Curve contours

outputs.name: Parameters
outputs.description: Curve parameters for all contour points

name: Horizontal Frames
description: Generate a number of equally spaced, horizontally aligned curve frames.

name: Simplify Curve
description: Simplify a curve.

inputs.name: Tolerance
inputs.description: Optional deviation tolerance (if omitted, the current document tolerance is used)

inputs.name: Angle Tolerance
inputs.description: Optional angle tolerance (if omitted, the current document tolerance is used)

outputs.name: Simplified
outputs.description: True if curve was modified in any way

name: Rebuild Curve
description: Rebuild a curve with a specific number of control-points.

inputs.name: Degree
inputs.description: Optional degree of curve (if omitted, input degree is used)

name: Divide curve [OBSOLETE]
description: [OBSOLETE; Replaced by new Divide Component]

name: Dash Pattern
description: Convert a curve to a dash pattern.

inputs.name: Pattern
inputs.description: An collection of dash and gap lengths.

name: Perp Frames
description: Generate a number of equally spaced, perpendicular frames along a curve.

name: Rectangle 3Pt
description: Create a rectangle from three points

inputs.name: Point C
inputs.description: Point along rectangle edge opposite to AB

outputs.name: Rectangle
outputs.description: Rectangle defined by A, B and C.

name: Arc SED
description: Create an arc defined by start point, end point and a tangent vector.

name: Modified Arc
description: Create an arc based on another arc.

name: Arc 3Pt
description: Create an arc through three points.

name: Length Parameter
description: Measure the length of a curve to and from a parameter.

outputs.name: Length
outputs.description: Curve length from start to parameter

outputs.name: Length
outputs.description: Curve length from parameter to end

name: Fit Curve
description: Fit a curve along another curve.

inputs.name: Degree
inputs.description: Optional degree of curve (if omitted, input degree is used)

inputs.name: Tolerance
inputs.description: Tolerance for fitting (if omitted, document tolerance is used)

name: Curve Depth
description: Measure the depth of a curve.

outputs.name: Minimum Parameter
outputs.description: Parameter along curve where minimum depth occurred.

outputs.name: Maximum Parameter
outputs.description: Parameter along curve where maximum depth occurred.

name: Poly Arc
description: Create a polycurve consisting of arc and line segments.

name: Point In Curve
description: Test a point for closed curve containment.

name: Curvature
description: Evaluate the curvature of a curve at a specified parameter.

inputs.name: Parameter
inputs.description: Parameter on curve domain to evaluate

name: Derivatives
description: Evaluate the derivatives of a curve at a specified parameter.

inputs.name: Parameter
inputs.description: Parameter on curve domain to evaluate

name: Explode
description: Explode a curve into smaller segments.

inputs.name: Recursive
inputs.description: Recursive decomposition until all segments are atomic

outputs.name: Segments
outputs.description: Exploded segments that make up the base curve

name: Center
description: Find the center point and radius of arcs and circles.

name: Offset on Srf
description: Offset a curve on a surface with a specified distance.

name: Line 4Pt
description: Create a line from four points.

inputs.name: Point A
inputs.description: First point to project onto the guide.

inputs.name: Point B
inputs.description: Second point to project onto the guide.

outputs.name: Line
outputs.description: Line segment between A and B

name: Curve Side
description: Find on which side of a curve a point exists

inputs.name: Plane
inputs.description: Optional plane to measure in. If omitted, the curve plane will be used.

outputs.name: Side
outputs.description: Side of curve on which point was found (-1=Left, 0=Coincident, +1=Right).

outputs.name: Left
outputs.description: Boolean indicating whether a point is to the left of the curve.

outputs.name: Right
outputs.description: Boolean indicating whether a point is to the right of the curve.

name: Arc
description: Create an arc defined by base plane, radius and angle domain.

name: Polyline Collapse
description: Collapse short segments in a polyline curve.

outputs.name: Count
outputs.description: Number of segments that were collapsed

name: Circle Fit
description: Fit a circle to a collection of points.

outputs.name: Deviation
outputs.description: Maximum distance between circle and points

name: Horizontal Frame
description: Get a horizontally aligned frame along a curve at a specified parameter.

inputs.name: Parameter
inputs.description: Parameter on curve domain to evaluate

name: Containment
description: Test a point for curve region containment.

name: TwoByFourJam
description: Jam a two-by-four into a crooked room

inputs.name: Samples
inputs.description: Number of samples to take (more samples = better solution)

name: Derivatives
description: Evaluate the derivatives of a curve at a specified parameter.

inputs.name: Parameter
inputs.description: Parameter on curve domain to evaluate

description: Measure the length of a curve.

outputs.name: Parameter

description: Measure and set the curve domain

inputs.name: Domain
inputs.description: Optional domain, if omitted the curve will not be modified.
